alert.note: Alert for Abbeville; Anderson; Greenville; Greenwood; Laurens (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 07 at 4:50PM EDT until August 07 at 5:30PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: The National Weather Service in Greenville-Spartanburg has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Elbert County in northeastern Georgia... Southwestern Laurens County in Upstate South Carolina... Southeastern Greenville County in Upstate South Carolina... Southeastern Anderson County in Upstate South Carolina... Abbeville County in Upstate South Carolina... Western Greenwood County in Upstate South Carolina... * Until 530 PM EDT. * At 450 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 3 miles east of Anderson to 17 miles northwest of Abbeville to 7 miles west of Elberton, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Greenwood, Laurens, Abbeville, Elberton, Belton, Williamston, Honea Path, Ware Shoals, Calhoun Falls and Due West. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report damaging winds, hail, or flooding to the National Weather Service by calling toll free, 1, 800, 2 6 7, 8 1 0 1, or by posting on our Facebook page, or Tweet it using hashtag nwsgsp. Your message should describe the event and the specific location where it occurred.
